reporting_cycle: Secretary-General reports no later than 15 October 2008 and three weeks before 31 January 2009
summary:
11. Calls for redoubled efforts to publish the electoral list, and requests the Special Representative to certify it.

12. Welcomes financial assistance to the Independent Electoral Commission.

13. Calls on donors to increase financial support to cantonment, disarmament, and reintegration of former combatants.

14. Commends efforts to facilitate reintegration of former combatants through micro-projects.

15. Requests the Secretary-General to ensure compliance with the UN zero-tolerance policy on sexual exploitation and abuses.

16. Urges Ivorian political forces to rely on mediation by the Facilitator for electoral process difficulties.

17. Commends the Facilitator's support and requests UNOCI to assist him.

18. Requests the Secretary-General to provide regular reports on the situation and electoral process.

19. Decides to remain seized of the matter.
